instruction: Specify three features from the given product.
input: Product: Philips Sonicare Diamond Clean Toothbrush
output:
The Philips Sonicare Diamond Clean Toothbrush has three features:

1. 3 modes which allows users to personalize their brushing experience according to their needs: clean, white, and gum care.

2. DiamondClean Brush Head which provides superior plaque removal and whitening.

3. Wireless charger which allows users to easily recharge the device.
